title: Pipelines and Redirection
content:
Redirection

echo "hello" > out.txt
echo "more" >> out.txt
ls /nope 2> err.txt

Pipes

The pipe operator | connects stdout of one command to stdin of the next.

ls -la | less
printf "a\nb\nc\n" | wc -l
cat app.log | grep "ERROR"

tee

uname -a | tee system.txt

tee is useful when you want to both see output and save it for later steps.
